block_comment: This block of code is used for assigning a value to the 'tag_wdata' signal. Depending on the state of the 'read_miss_fill' signal, the 'tag_wdata' signal is either assigned a set of concatenated values which includes a single bit '1', and a selected subset of bits from the 'miss_address', or it's assigned a string of '0's of length 'TAG_WIDTH'.
